General.Name: Thai Stanley Electric Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Stanley Electric Public Company Limited manufactures and sells automotive bulbs, lighting equipment, molds and dies, and product designs primarily in Thailand. It offers various automotive lighting products, including head lamps and rear combination lamps; auto bulb products; and motorcycle lighting products. The company also manufactures LED, and electronic components and equipment; and plastic products. It exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Muang, Thailand.
